snippet: The former Mets star Rusty Staub was resting comfortably in a hospital in Ireland after a heart attack on an overseas flight, the team said.
abstract: Former New York Mets player Rusty Staub is hospitalized after suffering heart attack during overseas flight.
lead_paragraph: The former Mets star Rusty Staub was resting comfortably in a hospital in Ireland after a heart attack on an overseas flight, the team said.
